name: Dash Rewriter
author: Dash Media Technology, LLC

sections.description:
Dash Rewriter helps to rewrite your content automatically the moment you hit the Publish button. The best use case for this plugin is for websites that are self-updating or those who are running multiple autoblogs and wants to have unique content for each of them.

We provide 30 recurring credits absolutely free. You will only utilize 1 credit per article or content post. This is sufficient if you publish 1 article per day for 30 days every month.

Below are the summary of the feature:

  • Free recurring credits: 30 per month
  • Unique article per post
  • Great for auto blogs or self-updating websites
  • Easy to install

To get the API key, you will need to register at Dash Developer
sections.faq:
What if I need more than 30 credits?

You can upgrade to our paid subscription plan for unlimited credit at a very low price.

How many websites can I use this for?

You can use on any self-hosted WordPress website that is own by you. We forbid the usage to use on clients or shared API keys.

How to get my API key?

You will have to register an account at our website Dash Developer. For more information, watch our tutorial.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First release

1.2

  • Fixed small bug

1.3

  • Save the metabox option
